title: Installation issue: Trilinos 12.18.1
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack spec dealii

dealii@9.1.1%gcc@9.3.1+adol-c+arpack+assimp build_type=DebugRelease ~cuda cuda_arch=none ~doc+ginkgo+gmsh+gsl+hdf5~int64+metis+mpi+muparser+nanoflann+netcdf+oce~optflags+p4est patches=6f876dc8eadafe2c4ec2a6673864fb451c6627ca80511b6e16f3c401946fdf33 +petsc~python+scalapack+slepc+sundials+symengine+threads+trilinos arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^adol-c@2.7.2%gcc@9.3.1~advanced_branching+atrig_erf~boost+doc+examples~openmp~sparse arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^arpack-ng@3.7.0%gcc@9.3.1+mpi+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^cmake@3.17.0%gcc@9.3.1~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@9.3.1~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^pkgconf@1.6.3%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^openssl@1.1.1g%gcc@9.3.1+systemcerts arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^perl@5.30.1%gcc@9.3.1+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                    ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                        ^readline@8.0%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@9.3.1+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^mpich@3.3.2%gcc@9.3.1 device=ch3 +hydra+libxml2 netmod=tcp +pci pmi=pmi +romio~slurm~verbs+wrapperrpath arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^findutils@4.6.0%gcc@9.3.1 patches=84b916c0bf8c51b7e7b28417692f0ad3e7030d1f3c248ba77c42ede5c1c5d11e,bd9e4e5cc280f9753ae14956c4e4aa17fe7a210f55dd6c84aa60b12d106d47a2 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                    ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@9.3.1 patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                        ^libsigsegv@2.12%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^automake@1.16.2%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^texinfo@6.5%gcc@9.3.1 patches=12f6edb0c6b270b8c8dba2ce17998c580db01182d871ee32b7b6e4129bd1d23a,1732115f651cff98989cb0215d8f64da5e0f7911ebf0c13b064920f088f2ffe1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^libpciaccess@0.13.5%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@9.3.1~python arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^openblas@0.3.9%gcc@9.3.1~consistent_fpcsr~ilp64+pic+shared threads=none arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^assimp@4.0.1%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^boost@1.72.0%gcc@9.3.1+atomic+chrono~clanglibcpp~container~context~coroutine cxxstd=98 +date_time~debug+exception~fiber+filesystem+graph~icu+iostreams+locale+log+math~mpi+multithreaded~numpy~pic+program_options~python+random+regex+serialization+shared+signals~singlethreaded+system~taggedlayout+test+thread+timer~versionedlayout visibility=hidden +wave arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell

                ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^ginkgo@1.1.0%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=Release ~cuda cuda_arch=none ~develtools~full_optimizations+openmp+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^gmsh@4.5.4%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=RelWithDebInfo +compression~fltk~hdf5~metis+mpi+netgen+oce~opencascade~openmp~petsc~privateapi+shared~slepc+tetgen arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^gmp@6.1.2%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^netgen@5.3.1%gcc@9.3.1~gui~metis+mpi~oce arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^oce@0.18.3%gcc@9.3.1~X11+tbb arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^intel-tbb@2020.2%gcc@9.3.1 cxxstd=default patches=62ba015ebd1819c45bef47411540b789b493e31ca668c4ff4cb2afcbc306b476,ce1fb16fb932ce86a82ca87cf0431d1a8c83652af9f552b264213b2ff2945d73 +shared+tm arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^tetgen@1.5.0%gcc@9.3.1~debug~except patches=250ee7a9c97fbef4ed8796c70233631559fd2f4663affe6c824896880a605a24 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^gsl@2.5%gcc@9.3.1~external-cblas arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^hdf5@1.10.6%gcc@9.3.1+cxx~debug+fortran+hl+mpi+pic+shared~szip~threadsafe arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^numactl@2.0.12%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^metis@5.1.0%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=Release ~gdb~int64 patches=4991da938c1d3a1d3dea78e49bbebecba00273f98df2a656e38b83d55b281da1,b1225da886605ea558db7ac08dd8054742ea5afe5ed61ad4d0fe7a495b1270d2 ~real64+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^muparser@2.2.6.1%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^nanoflann@1.2.3%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^netcdf-c@4.7.3%gcc@9.3.1~dap~hdf4+mpi~parallel-netcdf+pic+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^netcdf-cxx@4.2%gcc@9.3.1+netcdf4 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^netlib-scalapack@2.1.0%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=RelWithDebInfo patches=f2baedde688ffe4c20943c334f580eb298e04d6f35c86b90a1f4e8cb7ae344a2 ~pic+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^p4est@2.2%gcc@9.3.1+mpi~openmp arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^petsc@3.13.0%gcc@9.3.1~X~batch clanguage=C ~complex~cuda~debug+double~fftw+hdf5+hypre~int64~knl+metis+mpi+mumps+shared+suite-sparse+superlu-dist~trilinos~valgrind arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^hypre@2.18.2%gcc@9.3.1~complex~debug~int64~internal-superlu~mixedint+mpi~openmp+shared~superlu-dist arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^mumps@5.2.0%gcc@9.3.1+complex+double+float~int64~metis+mpi~parmetis~ptscotch~scotch+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^parmetis@4.0.3%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~gdb patches=4f892531eb0a807eb1b82e683a416d3e35154a455274cf9b162fb02054d11a5b,50ed2081bc939269689789942067c58b3e522c269269a430d5d34c00edbc5870,704b84f7c7444d4372cb59cca6e1209df4ef3b033bc4ee3cf50f369bce972a9d +shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^python@3.7.7%gcc@9.3.1+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4~uuid+zlib arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^expat@2.2.9%gcc@9.3.1+libbsd arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^libbsd@0.10.0%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^gettext@0.20.1%gcc@9.3.1+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^tar@1.32%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^libffi@3.2.1%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^sqlite@3.30.1%gcc@9.3.1+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^suite-sparse@5.7.2%gcc@9.3.1~cuda~openmp+pic~tbb arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^superlu-dist@6.3.0%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~int64~openmp+shared arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^slepc@3.13.1%gcc@9.3.1+arpack~blopex arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^sundials@3.2.1%gcc@9.3.1+ARKODE+CVODE+CVODES+IDA+IDAS+KINSOL build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~cuda+examples-c~examples-cuda~examples-cxx~examples-f2003+examples-f77~examples-f90+examples-install~f2003~fcmix+generic-math~hypre~int64~klu~lapack+mpi~openmp~petsc precision=double ~pthread~raja+shared+static~superlu-dist~superlu-mt~trilinos arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^symengine@0.6.0%gcc@9.3.1~boostmp build_type=Release ~flint~llvm+mpc+mpfr~openmp~piranha+shared+thread_safe arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^mpc@1.1.0%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
            ^mpfr@4.0.2%gcc@9.3.1 patches=8f15fd27ab65341a60d724d594897d32f4597ddf642d0dc121995e2150181b0c arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
                ^autoconf-archive@2019.01.06%gcc@9.3.1 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
    ^trilinos@12.18.1%gcc@9.3.1~adios2~alloptpkgs+amesos+amesos2+anasazi+aztec+belos+boost build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~cgns~chaco~complex~debug~dtk+epetra+epetraext+exodus+explicit_template_instantiation~float+fortran~fortrilinos+glm gotype=int +gtest+hdf5+hypre+ifpack+ifpack2~intrepid~intrepid2~isorropia+kokkos+matio~mesquite+metis~minitensor+ml+muelu+mumps+netcdf~nox~openmp~phalanx~piro~pnetcdf~python~rol~rythmos+sacado~shards+shared~shylu~stk+suite-sparse~superlu~superlu-dist~teko~tempus+teuchos+tpetra~x11~xsdkflags~zlib+zoltan+zoltan2 arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^glm@0.9.7.1%gcc@9.3.1 build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
        ^matio@1.5.13%gcc@9.3.1+hdf5+shared+zlib arch=linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
```

```
spack install -j40 --only dependencies dealii
```

This is the top error

```
==> No patches needed for trilinos
==> 13521: trilinos: Building trilinos [CMakePackage]
==> 13521: trilinos: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> 13521: trilinos: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j40'

5940 errors found in build log:
     1261     [  3%] Building C object packages/seacas/libraries/exodus/CMakeFiles/exodus.dir/src/ex_cvt_nodes_to_sides.c.o
```

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-819-5fce2ac96
* **Python:** 3.8.2
* **Platform:** linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200422-broadwell
```

compilers.yaml file

```
compilers:
- compiler:
    spec: gcc@9.3.1
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc-9
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++-9
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran-9
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran-9
    flags: {}
    operating_system: opensuse_tumbleweed20200422
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
```

packages.yaml file

```
packages:
   hdf5:
      variants: +fortran +cxx +hl
   petsc:
      variants: +mumps +suite-sparse
   cgns:
      variants: +fortran
   all:
      providers:
         mpi: [mpich]
```

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4534672/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4534674/spack-build-env.txt)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

@aprokop  @keitat

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
